body.raw:
{
    "processname": "Process2",
    "conditionsList": [
        {
            "id": "start",
            "name": "StartEvent",
            "eventType": "startTask",
            "next": "task1"
        },
        {
            "id": "task1",
            "name": "userEvent",
            "eventType": "userTask",
            "owner": "webadmin",
            "next": "gateway1",
            "previous": "start",
			"mapvalue":"approved"
        },
      
        {
            "id": "gateway1",
            "name": "gatewayevent",
            "eventType": "exclusiveGateway",
            "previous": "task1",
			"next": "iftask1,iftask2",
            "condition": [
                {
                    "id": "iftask1",
                    "name": "trueEvent",
                    "eventType": "iftask",
                    "script": "System.out.println('cibil user Approved');",
                    "next": "task2",
                    "previous": "task1"
                },
                {
                    "id": "iftask2",
                    "name": "falseEvent",
                    "eventType": "iftask",
                    "script": "System.out.println('field user not aprroved');",
                    "next": "task3",
                    "previous": "task1"
                }
            ]
        },
		{
            "id": "task2",
            "name": "scriptEvent",
            "eventType": "scriptTask",
            "script": "System.out.println('script started');",
            "next": "end1",
            "previous": "iftask1",
            "connId": "userTask"
        },
		 {
            "id": "end1",
            "name": "endEvent",
            "eventType": "endTask",
            "previous": "iftask1"
        },
		 {
            "id": "task3",
            "name": "userEvent",
            "eventType": "userTask",
            "owner": "webadmin",
            "next": "task4",
            "previous": "iftask2",
			"mapvalue":"approved1"
        },
		{
            "id": "task4",
            "name": "scriptEvent",
            "eventType": "scriptTask",
            "script": "System.out.println('script started');",
            "next": "end2",
            "previous": "task3",
            "connId": "userTask"
        },
       
       
        {
            "id": "end2",
            "name": "endEvent",
            "eventType": "endTask",
            "previous": "iftask2"
        }
       
    ]

}

{
    "processname": "Process3",
    "conditionsList": [
        {
            "id": "startEvent",
            "name": "Start",
            "eventType": "startTask",
            "next": "task1"
        },
        {
            "id": "task1",
            "name": "scriptevent",
            "eventType": "scriptTask",
            "script": "System.out.println('loan request generated');",
            "next": "gateway1",
            "previous": "startEvent"
        },
        {
            "id": "gateway1",
            "name": "gatewayevent",
            "eventType": "parallelGateway",
            "next": "task2,task3,task4",
            "previous": "task1",
            "path": [
                {
                    "id": "task2",
                    "name": "scriptevent",
                    "eventType": "scriptTask",
                    "script": "System.out.println('Account holder details approve');",
                    "next": "gateway4",
                    "previous": "gateway1"
                },
                {
                    "id": "task3",
                    "name": "scriptevent",
                    "eventType": "scriptTask",
                    "script": "System.out.println('pending cibil varify');",
                    "next": "task5",
                    "previous": "gateway1"
                },
                {
                    "id": "task4",
                    "name": "scriptevent",
                    "eventType": "scriptTask",
                    "script": "System.out.println('pending filed varify');",
                    "next": "task6",
                    "previous": "gateway1"
                }
            ]
        },
        {
            "id": "task5",
            "name": "userevent",
            "eventType": "userTask",
            "owner": "infraadmin",
            "next": "gateway2",
            "previous": "task3"
        },
        {
            "id": "task6",
            "name": "userevent",
            "eventType": "userTask",
            "owner": "adminuser",
            "next": "gateway3",
            "previous": "task4"
        },
        {
            "id": "gateway2",
            "name": "gatewayevent",
            "eventType": "exclusiveGateway",
			"next": "iftask1,iftask2",
            "previous": "task5",
            "condition": [
                {
                    "id": "iftask1",
                    "name": "trueEvent",
                    "eventType": "iftask",
                    "script": "System.out.println('cibil user Approved');",
                    "next": "gateway4",
                    "previous": "task5"
                },
                {
                    "id": "iftask2",
                    "name": "falseEvent",
                    "eventType": "iftask",
                    "script": "System.out.println('field user not aprroved');",
                    "next": "task8",
                    "previous": "task5"
                }
            ]
        },
        {
            "id": "gateway3",
            "name": "gatewayevent",
            "eventType": "exclusiveGateway",
            "previous": "task6",
			"next": "iftask3,iftask4",
            "condition": [
                {
                    "id": "iftask3",
                    "name": "trueEvent",
                    "eventType": "iftask",
                    "script": "System.out.println('field user Approved');",
                    "next": "gateway4",
                    "previous": "task6"
                },
                {
                    "id": "iftask4",
                    "name": "falseEvent",
                    "eventType": "iftask",
                    "script": "System.out.println('field not aprroved');",
                    "next": "task7",
                    "previous": "task6"
                }
            ]
        },
        {
            "id": "task7",
            "name": "scriptevent",
            "eventType": "scriptTask",
            "script": "System.out.println('loan rejected by cibill');",
            "next": "endEvent1",
            "previous": "gateway3"
        },
        {
            "id": "task8",
            "name": "scriptevent",
            "eventType": "scriptTask",
            "script": "System.out.println('loan rejected by field officer');",
            "next": "endEvent2",
            "previous": "gateway2"
        },
        {
            "id": "gateway4",
            "name": "gatewayevent",
            "eventType": "inclusiveGateway",
            "next": "task9",
			"previous": "iftask1,iftask3,task2",
            "combineFrom":"iftask1,iftask3,task2"
        },
        {
            "id": "task9",
            "name": "scriptevent",
            "eventType": "scriptTask",
            "script": "System.out.println('loan approved');",
            "next": "endEvent3",
            "previous": "gateway4"
        },
        {
            "id": "endEvent1",
            "name": "endtask",
            "eventType": "endTask",
            "previous": "task7"
        },
        {
            "id": "endEvent2",
            "name": "endtask",
            "eventType": "endTask",
            "previous": "task8"
        },
        {
            "id": "endEvent3",
            "name": "endtask",
            "eventType": "endTask",
            "previous": "task9"
        }
    ]
}
